name: mail-ticket-handler.yml
configuration:
spring:
  application:
    name: nttm-mail-ticket-handler
  jmx:
    default-domain: my-app-mail-ticket-jmx
  mail:
    smtp:
      starttls:
        enable: true
email:
  host: art-platform.io
  mailbox: INBOX
  username: nttm_incident%40rt.ru
  password: Ru48ueHc
  poll-rate: 60000
  port: 8084
  allow-run: true
server:
  port: 8281 #TODO to be deleted
nttm:
  clientRequestProcessName: "new"
  clientTicketType: 1
  tt:
    maxReturn: 1000
  tasks:
    types:
      registrationTypeId: 1
    codes:
      termCloseCodesId:  30, 36, 84
      reOpenCloseCodeId: 84
  sourceSystemCatalog: cat_source_system
  sourceSystemName: e-mail
  sleepSeconds: 5
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
